spec_data.Name: texlive-subfigmat
spec_data.Description:
Defines an array/matrix-type environment that is used with the
subfigure package to automate the placement of subfigures (or
tables or text). The subfigures are placed left-to-right, top-
to-bottom.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:18:12 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Automates layout when using the subfigure package
